effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.

short_effect.sun-moon: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
